message.content:
Based on the provided profiles and credit specifications, here's the ranking from most suitable (#1) to least suitable (#4):

#1 Rank (54 years old, Google Senior Software Engineer): Most suitable candidate. Stable high-income position, substantial bank account balance, well-distributed own funds, and close to retirement age.

#2 Rank (57 years old, Swiss Red Cross Communications Head): Strong profile with stable employment, good own funds distribution, and near retirement age.

#3 Rank (36 years old, KPMG Auditor): Good professional stability, slightly lower bank account balance compared to top candidates, mid-career stage.

#4 Rank (30 years old, Herzog & de Meuron Architect): Youngest candidate, stable job but potentially less financial stability and shorter career trajectory compared to others.

Key considerations: All candidates have similar net income, permanent employment, and exactly 218,000 CHF in own funds. Age, career stage, and fund distribution were primary ranking differentiators.
